metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11523 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The ReadTXTImage function in coders/txt.c in ImageMagick through 6.9.9-0 and 7.x through 7.0.6-1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a crafted file, because the end-of-file condition is not considered.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is 0102-CVE-2017-11523-endless-loop-in-ReadTXTImage.patch in unstable This is 0087-CVE-2017-11523-endless-loop-in-ReadTXTImage.patch in stretch This is 0243-Fix-endless-loop-in-ReadTXTImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
